MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Rhoshirwaun and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30AM to make emergency repairs to damaged equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27AM on 23rd November 2020
